attributes.action: Take the TV show "Loose Women" off the air
attributes.background: The TV show "Loose Women" has long been a stomping ground for belittling Men whilst sanctimoniously claiming to be believers in Equality. They're coverage of a Man found not Guilty of Rape was misinformed, incorrect and down right wrong. this show has no place on the air

rejection.details:
You can find out how to make a complaint to ITV here:

http://www.itv.com/contactus
